body: By "quick test" you mean that you actually implemented Log with FYL2X, compiled it on amd64 with the go assembler, and it was fine? If yes, could you please share the code? Because I was under the assumption that the instruction set go uses for amd64 (sse2) didn't have a log instruction, and that FPU instructions couldn't be used on amd64 with the go assembler (I think I read that somewhere).
